NYC Museum Connoisseur

Curated gallery guide for world-class contemporary and modern art

For an unforgettable weekend of museum-hopping, here's my selection of the best the city has to offer

Fall Exhibits in NYC

The GuggenheimArt, Architecture, and Innovation: Celebrating the Guggenheim Museum documents Frank Lloyd Wright’s Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum

The Metropolitam Museum of ArtJoin Andrew Bolton, the Wendy Yu Curator in Charge of The Costume Institute, on a tour of the exhibition, In America: A Lexicon of Fashion,

Museum of Modern ArtMariana Salem, assistant director of Special Programming and Events, takes a close look at José Dolores López’s "Adam and Eve and the Serpent" (c. 1930)

We’ve always needed museums to help us commune with our artistic ancestors and listen in on the group mind. These upcoming art shows at New York institutions, from the Guggenheim to the MoMa, deserve our attention — and our love.
